name: Bert Nash Community Mental Health Center INC

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Bert Nash Community Mental Health Center INC is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Lawrence, KS. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $28.8M in Medicaid payments across 180K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $28.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
